name: Rockhopper
description: For accounting and finance users who have difficulty collaborating, streamlining workflows, and accessing institutional knowledge, Rockhopper makes it easier to understand and track processes, increase transparency, and save time executing tedious work.
one_liner: For accounting and finance users who have difficulty collaborating, streamlining workflows, and accessing institutional knowledge, Rockhopper makes it easier to understand and track processes, increase transparency, and save time executing tedious work.
location: New York City, New York, United States
